Programming

Javascript

I love Javascript ! It is a very creative language. Although I have only 1.5 year of experience of Javascript, I have learned a lot about this language, spending at least 5-6 hours a day on it. Some related framework and libaries I have learned include the following:

Python

I have been coding in Python for about 2 years. Over the period, I have finished several Python books and courses and built some projects including small games and puzzles. Here are the some of the Python libraries I have worked with:

Database

Java, C, Haskell

These languages are the ones I have learned quite well when I took the courses at KAIST. Since C++ was my first and favourite language, I am quite good at Java and C while I have not done any noteworthy project using Haskell.
